citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:40-9:10 am on 16-
FEB-22. The inspector knocked on doors, honked the horn, left a voicemail message, and waited 30 minutes before
departing the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:40-9:10 am on 16-
FEB-22.  The inspector knocked on doors, honked the horn, left a voicemail message, and waited 30 minutes before 
departing the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
